mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info( user_name, password, real_name, phone, user_card, email, gender, gmt_create, gmt_modified ) VALUES(#{userName},#{password},#{realName},#{phone}, #{userCard},#{email},#{gender},#{gmt_create},#{gmt_modified});
mapper.select: SELECT password from user_info where user_name=#{userName};
SELECT password from user_info where phone=#{phone};
